markdownRemark.html: Develop a sounding board for new ideas. Give them chance early on in projects to give feedback. Invest enough time initially to make it worthwhile to them, then ask pointed questions for feedback. A good sounding board can save immense amounts of time down the road.

frontmatter.description: Develop a sounding board for new ideas. Give them chance early on in projects to give feedback & save time later.
frontmatter.title: Develop a sounding board for ideas
